info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Catawba, southern Alexander and southeastern Caldwell Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Lenoir, or 5 miles southeast of Cedar Rock, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Taylorsville, Bethlehem, Cedar Rock, Lake Hickory, Claremont, St. Stephens, Lookout Shoals Lake, Stony Point and Hudson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
